body.description: A symbol of strength and longevity, the Ginkgo tree has rightly earned such notoriety by its ability to often live for 1, 000 years. Thus, a note to a friend in need of an encouraging word is surely the perfect pairing for this spirited motif.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.8 4.8 out of 5 stars 24 ratings 4.8 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I stock up as much as I could
reviews.reviewText: Crane has a wonderful selection of hand-engraved cards, however, they seem to run out if you wait too long. I purchased 5 packages.I *love* ginkgo leaves and the engraving on the card is just beautiful. It's gold, very detailed and is the right scale for the card. The ecru card color really sets it off. The card is heavy weight. I write my notes with a fountain pen and my left hand. The paper quickly absorbs the ink and it does not bleed to the other side.The price is a little steep but it's in line with the rest of Crane's stock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Thick, heavy paper stock, lovely embossment on front page. Makes a boring old thank you note look classy and elegant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful small notecards
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful small notecards, perfect for thank-you notes. The thick paper and gold embossing give them a really high-quality look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: There was a time when this notecard would have been the "gold standard" of handwritten correspondence. In today's society, where it is rare to even receive hand-written correspondence, this notecard card is elevated to the best of the best. Very satisfied with the quality of my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The stationery is beautiful as are the lined envelopes
reviews.reviewText: The stationery is beautiful as are the lined envelopes. I love the weight, the off-white color, the embossed gold leaves. They can be used for informal notes or for very special ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always a favorite, the creamy thick Crane paper is enhanced with ...
reviews.reviewText: Always a favorite, the creamy thick Crane paper is enhanced with the beautiful ginkgo design and matte lined envelopes. Love these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Gorgeous, mid-weight stationary. Smaller than anticipated so use small print. Worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for short letters/notes to people
reviews.reviewText: I will purchase again. Perfect for short letters/notes to people.
